page.title: 13 N.E.Wolverhampton: Shopping
page.content: The largest shopping centre in the area is at Wednesfield because this is the major town. There are over 50 shops, including Woolworths and a market. The second largest shopping place has 30-50 shops and is at the Scotlands;and joint third largest shopping centres with 20 -29 shops are at Ashmore Park,Fallings Park and Park Village.At the Scotlands the shopping centre is quite large because it is situated on the main roads and well into the suburban area. There are from 10-19 shops at Park Village, Newbolds, Showell Circus, Bushbury Lane,Northwood Park Road,Wood End, and Perry Hall. These have formed as houses have developed. There are even smaller shopping centres with less than 10 shops at Fallings Park, Newbold, Wood End, three small centres at Wood Hayes, and one other in Wednesfield as well.
